item.title: BlackHat/Def Con/BSides Talk Picks for 2016
item.description: Each year I make up a list the week before Blackhat and Def Con of talks that I “can’t miss” and some that I want to see (and use it for video watching afterwards for those I missed). This year I thought I would share that list here. I will be breaking them down by each day of the events by time slot. Any talk I have a ðŸŒŸ by, is a “Must see” for me.
